categories: Category:Military units and formations of the Imperial Navy (Sith Empire)

nodes.text: The Twenty-first Starfighter Division was a starfighter division in the Imperial Navy of the reconstituted Sith Empire. Sergeant Defain was a member of the division who was decorated for the Battles of Coruscant and Ilum, where he flew sorties. Whilst the Starfighter Division's fleet was chased by the Galactic Republic, Defain was assigned to the Sith Empire's space station above the planet Makeb in Hutt Space.
